mapper.select: select t.emp_name as team_mgr_name,t.emp_no as approval_team_no,a.emp_name as mgr_name,a.emp_no as approval_mgr_no from (select emp_name,emp_no from emp where emp_no = (select emp_mgr from emp where emp_no=#{emp_no})) t, (select emp_name,emp_no from emp where job_no=3) a

select t.emp_name as team_mgr_name,s.emp_name as mgr_name, a.approval_no,a.emp_no,a.approval_choose_no,to_char(a.approval_submit_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as approval_submit_date,a.approval_start_date,a.approval_end_date,a.approval_comment, to_char(a.approval_team_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as approval_team_date,a.approval_mgr_date from approval a, (select emp_name from emp where emp_no = (select emp_mgr from emp where emp_no=#{emp_no})) t, (select emp_name from emp where job_no=3) s where a.emp_no=#{emp_no}
mapper.update: update approval set approval_team_date =to_date(#{approval_team_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where approval_no=#{approval_no}
update approval set approval_mgr_date =to_date(#{approval_mgr_date},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where approval_no=#{approval_no}
